summary: Dini GC (Anonymous Global Chat Website) project; rebranding site display name to "Dini GC" and exploring changing the site URL via a custom domain (dinigc.com) plus adding an icon next to the website name (favicon).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Simple flat favicon icon (dinigc-favicon.dim_64x64.png)
- Flat app icon for mobile bookmarks (dinigc-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)

existing_features.title: Update the website display name shown in the browser tab (HTML document title) from "Anonymous Global Chat Website" to "Dini GC" without changing the site URL/link.
Add support for a site icon (favicon) so an image appears next to the website name in the browser tab by referencing favicon assets from the HTML head.
Add the favicon image files as static assets in the frontend so they are included in the build output and can be referenced directly from `frontend/index.html`.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change the website display name/title from "Anonymous Global Chat Website" to "Dini GC" (not the link/URL).
Connect/use custom domain dinigc.com for the website URL (instead of the autogenerated caffeine.xyz subdomain).
Add an image icon next to the website name in the browser tab (favicon).
